system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 1st-level, your archetype spells are selected from one of several lists, chosen from below. Your choice of archetype spell list affects other features from this archetype.

Table: Stone Priest Spells

1@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.nglt6e6nfub7kqfj]{Earth Barrier}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.2u5jeuyp9tya031k]{Grease}
3@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ap6klied8mqbclvn]{Enlarge/Reduce}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.7e9cvnpmbg3knm9l]{Shatter}
5@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.9fjvzhj8c1nd7xbl]{Glyph of Warding}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.gea02oa3pgs5y9yb]{Meld Into Stone}
7@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ble3ggi0tc4u550j]{Stone Shape}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.22rh6x031cqpcdwc]{Stoneskin}
9@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} (earth only), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ykssqr7n3a5iif2k]{Wall of Stone}
